exam.question: He is ______ about his chances of winning a gold medal in the Olympics next year.

answer.explain: 句意： 他对自己在明年奥运会上获得一枚金牌的可能性非常乐观。 optional： 可选择的； 随意的； outstanding： 突出的， 显著的； obvious： 明显的， 显而易见的。

sentences.sContent: Andrew took a more optimistic view.
sentences.sCn: 安德鲁抱有更为乐观的想法。

sentences.sContent: ...Joel Stein wrote　an extensive piece on Millennials and he remains rather optimistic about our potential...
...Cohen said although he and his co-author are optimistic about many aspects of the Internet...

remMethod.val: optim(最好) ＋ istic(…的) → 什么都往最好处想的 → 乐观的

trans.tranCn: 乐观的， 乐观主义的
trans.tranOther: believing that good things will happen in the future
